DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to describe the relative distances between patient clinical profiles (i.e. patient clustering) in multivariate space.
DOC.brief_title: Clustering Among the Clinical Profiles of Patients With Pectus Excavatum
DOC.detailed_description: Observational data will be collected from patient files and submitted to clustering analyses. Then clusters will be compared.
DOC.criteria: Adult patient with pectus excavatum The patient has had corrective surgery The patient has expressed opposition to the study
